mapper.select: SELECT o.capacity as capacity, o.occupied_capacity as occupied_capacity, o.lock_code_hash as lock_code_hash, o.lock_hash_type as lock_hash_type, o.lock_args as lock_args, o.lock_script_hash as lock_script_hash, o.tx_hash as generated_tx_hash, o.output_index as cell_index, o.type_code_hash as type_code_hash, o.type_hash_type as type_hash_type, o.type_args as type_args, o.type_script_hash as type_script_hash, o.data as data FROM output o WHERE o.tx_hash = #{txHash} ORDER BY o.output_index ASC
